version_description:
Back to school for Somfy Protect with this technical update fixing minor bugs and improving the overall quality of your App.
In addition, the alarm banner improves and allows a more effective management in case of alert, directly from the App.
Stay tuned for more info!

In this version :
- You can now choose the way you want the siren of your Somfy One and One+ to be triggered
- You can access your cameras with 3D Touch on compatible devices
Minor bug fixes and improved App performance.
Minor bug fixes and improved App performance.
Minor bug fixes and improved App performance.
Minor bug fixes and improved App performance.
Minor bug fixes and improved App performance.
We have improved the stability of the App and did some bug fixes.

This update improves the presence display of users on your home screen: it is no longer necessary to have a keyfob to know who is present or not at home. Go to the Privacy menu to adjust your settings. The Kids menu is also improved and allows you to adjust the tracking, either by using a key fob or via the GPS of your child's smartphone.

Do you own a Google Home and want to control your Somfy Protect using your voice ? It is now possible ! Discover how to turn on your alarm, open your camera privacy shutter, turn on night mode, or get the summary of events through your Google Assistant. Within the Settings, go to the Smart Home section to discover the Google Assistant menu.

This release also fixes minor bugs and help to improve the App stability.

This update improves the presence display of users on your home screen: it is no longer necessary to have a keyfob to know who is present or not at home. Go to the Privacy menu to adjust your settings. The Kids menu is also improved and allows you to adjust the tracking, either by using a key fob or via the GPS of your child's smartphone.

Do you own a Google Home and want to control your Somfy Protect using your voice ? It is now possible ! Discover how to turn on your alarm, open your camera privacy shutter, turn on night mode, or get the summary of events through your Google Assistant. Within the Settings, go to the Smart Home section to discover the Google Assistant menu.

This release also fixes minor bugs and help to improve the App stability.

The Somfy Protect Application now supports Polish and Czech.

This release also fixes minor bugs and help to improve the App stability.

This version 3.0 of the App brings a new navigation experience with faster and better access to the features of your installation.
You can also install our new camera, the Somfy Indoor Camera.
Discover it !

Discover it !

This version 3.0 of the App brings a new navigation experience with faster and better access to the features of your installation.
You can also install our new camera, the Somfy Indoor Camera.
Discover it !

This new version of the App fixes some bugs, mainly focused on the display and the user management.
In addition, our Greek customers can now enjoy a complete experience in their language.

This new version of the App fixes some bugs focused on display, user management and Link installation.
In addition, our Greek customers can now enjoy a complete experience in their language.
Minor bug fixes and improved App performance.

We are constantly improving the functionality, security and performance of our application. Our goal is to bring you an app that’s reliable and easy to use.
Thank you for your confidence in Somfy.
This new version of the Application allows you to control your Home Keeper equipment installed and configured by your installer.

This update of the App now allows you to install the Somfy Outdoor Camera. Equipped with a powerful siren and a full HD sensor with night vision, your camera will notify you when motion is detected and you can download a free video clip. Connected to an outdoor lighting, your camera triggers lighting for added security. Discover it quickly!

This update of the App now allows you to install the Somfy Outdoor Camera. Equipped with a powerful siren and a full HD sensor with night vision, your camera will notify you when motion is detected and you can download a free video clip. Connected to an outdoor lighting, your camera triggers lighting for added security. Discover it quickly!
Home Keeper users can now install the Somfy Outdoor Camera, our outdoor camera with built-in siren. The night mode is also enriched: you can set your cameras in night mode to make them active or not.
Home Keeper users can now install the Somfy Outdoor Camera, our outdoor camera with built-in siren. The night mode is also enriched: you can set your cameras in night mode to make them active or not.
Home Keeper users can now set their cameras in night mode to make them active or not.

This new update contains :
- Indoor detector: it’s now possible to choose between immediate siren and siren after warning.
- Outdoor camera: Disable the siren. You can now mute the siren of the outdoor camera.
- If you have an alarm Home Keeper you can now activate and deactivate the detection of your camera in night mode.

This new update contains :
You can now download your detection clips more easily from the screen at the end of the video.
The application now fully supports Swedish and Danish.
This version also fixes the bugs and the slight instabilities that you put back to us.

This new version features the following additions for Somfy Protect users:

• You can now link your devices to a specific room or location (function only available with Home Keeper user cameras).
• The names of your devices and rooms can now be synchronized with the Apple Home app (compatible devices: Somfy Indoor Camera).
• For Home Keeper users, when activating your alarm, you will be notified if a door or window was left open.
• For Home Keeper users, control with your voice your alarm using Amazon Alexa.
• This version also fixes bugs and slight instability brought to our attention.

• The names of your devices and rooms can now be synchronized with the Apple Home app (compatible devices: Somfy Indoor Camera).
• For Home Keeper users, when activating your alarm, you will be notified if a door or window was left open.
• For Home Keeper users, control with your voice your alarm using Amazon Alexa.
• This version also fixes bugs and slight instability brought to our attention.

Thank you for your confidence in Somfy.
